To me, this game is still as great now as is was in 2004. Everything checks out and the levels never seem to become dull, repetitive or boring. The storyline may make no sense if you simply breeze through the game and don't pay attention to the dialogue, though if you take the time to listen, it becomes a lot more gripping and really emerses you, making you feel like you are Gordon Freeman. The voice acting is some of the best I have seen in games, and to be honest, I don't like giving games perfect judgements, though I cannot find criticism with the game(except the fact that that Half Life 2 Episode 3 is taking so long due to Gabe Newell's inability to do simple maths. Hint for Gabe: ABC is not as easy as 12, there's another number after the two, and it isn't 2.1 or 2.2).  

In conclusion, this game is still great and will continue to be. Even though the series will remain incomplete, I'm perfectly fine playing this, along with the equally as good  sequels: Episode One and Episode Two :D

It's the one of the most AMAZINGIST VIDJA GAYMEZ EVAR!

There are few games that can achieve what Half-Life 2 did, as of today's standards it remains one of the most precious jewels that the gaming crown has. The levels are expertly crafted, the story unfolds slowly but surely as you keep going forward, music starts playing at the right time with the right tone, and most importantly; the gameplay is masterfully designed. Do yourself a favor: Just play this game, you won't regret it.

Now I truly know why so many people want a third installment of this series; THIS GAME IS BAD-ASS BUT IT ISN'T COMPLETE! 

The gameplay is truly remarkable, since you have to constantly think and be aware of your surroundings in order to beat this game. Unlike other mindless FPS games where you simply shoot endless hoards of bad guys for two hours. 

This game has an actual story and it's very interesting! The only problem is that it isn't complete, and there's so many loose ends that need to be tied up;

1.) Who is the G-Man and who does he work for?
2.) How exactly does teleportation and inter-dimmensional travel work?
3.) Why is traveling to another universe so important that the goverment puts all their money into it? Is there a mountain of adamantium on the other side of the portal?! I DON'T GET IT!
4.) Who are the combine and how did they get to earth?
5.) Why the hell did humanity surrender to the aliens? They have the technology and the weapons to fight against them!
6.) Why didn't the aliens just wipe humanity out when they surrendered instead of make peace with them?
7.) WHY THE HELL CAN'T GORDAN FREEMAN TALK?!

So what's taking Valve so long?! Make HL3 already!

Oh yeah, that's right...I'm spending all my money on Steam Sales and DOTA 2 cosmetics, so Valve has no need to make another video game to make profit...

In the meantime, might as well play this game...again...
10/10 would crowbar again.

Tahle hra na mě zapůsobila již od prvních dnů hraní. Nepochybně ve mnohém předčila svýho předchůdce. Není to ani tak grafika nebo stála akce, co mě k této hře přilákalo, je to hlavně příběh a dokonalá vyváženost (není to hra, při který by se člověk několik hodin bezcílně trápil a zárověň není taková, že by se dala projít bez sebemenšího zaváhání ). Ve hře v závisloti na kapitole se pokaždé trochu pozmění styl hraní aby to hráče neomrzelo a průběžné dialogy (ne bez humoru) mě osobně nikdy nenudily. Rozhodně jsem těch pár utracených korun nelitoval (podle mého názoru je cena téhle hry více nežli mírná). Ovšem opakuji, že tato hra není pro ty, co na hře přitahuje hlavně grafická stránka...

Plusy:
+Świetna fabuła
+Różnorodność broni
Minusy:
-Słaba grafika

+: Herní doba, neustále měnící se prostředí, nepřátelé, zbraně, ovládání antlionů :3 (dozvíte se oč de až v půlce hry), atmosféra, postavy, design, cena, vozidla, ochočenný headcrab Dr.Kleinera, zvraty příběh, soundtrack

-: velké množství bugů

Závěr: začátek velké série Half Life 2 je FPS Sci-Fi střílečka z pohledu první osoby, hru dohrajete za necelých 14 hodin, skvělé přostředí, atmosféra a nepřátelé učinili Half Life 2 mojí Top Hrou ke které se vždycky s úsměvem vrátím, samozřejmě nesmíme zapomenout na skvělé grafické spracování, akorát jsou zde jenom bugy, nic víc šatného zde není, hra nepadá a pokud hledáte Single player střilečku takje Half Life 2 správná volba.

Half-Life 2 chybí k dokonalosti velmi, velmi málo. I tak ale je po stránce hratelnosti, originality, technického zpracování a uměleckého dojmu jednou z nejlepších her všech dob a dost možná nejlepší first-person akcí vůbec. Half-Life 2 je opravdu strhující a zábavný počin, který by bylo hříchem minout. Zbývá dodat jediné: Valve, děkujeme!
I'm just waiting for Half Life 3.. Please!
Having played this when it was released back in the day and now playing it asll over again is just as great as the first experience! Still the best game ever created.

Half-Life mostrou que jogos FPS poderiam ter uma ótima história e uma jogabilidade interessante, misturando bem os dois generos sem ser descerebrado como um DOOM, DN3D e outros jogos - não digo que os jogos são ruins, mesmo porque numa outra crítica, para mim, DOOM e Wolf3D são os maiorais de hoje, de ontem e de sempre -, e a Valve demostrou muito bem isso.

Agora Half-Life 2 chegou num outro patamar. O inicio é bem parecido com o primeiro jogo, mostrando os elementos a serem usados durante o mesmo, uma espécie de tutorial, mas sem as idiotices de serem chamadas de tutorial. É nesta hora que você vai perceber se sabe ou não jogar um FPS. Passando por esta parte inicial, a jogabilidade do mesmo demostra que se faz necessário ter certas habilidades para avançar no jogo, mais por conta da Engine física Havok que permite manipular, agora, os objetos caídos ao chão.

Com vários inimigos com capacidades ofensivas e defensivas bastante diferenciadas, o jogador tem de saber quando usar o pé-de-quebra, a metralhadora, uma granada ou a escopeta, use a arma errada e perca dezenas de pontos de energia.

O que mais impressiona, no entanto, é a forma que a história foi contada, tudo entre as sombras, e que esperamos que haja a continuação devida, pois queremos ver qual será o final de Gordon Freeman.

Half-Life 2 é uma obra de arte gamer e, merecidamente, recebeu o prêmio de O JOGO DA DÉCADA ano passado...

Bem que a Valve poderia lançar HL2:Epi3 e HL3 no mesmo dia para comemorar esse grande prêmio.
Ótima historia e trilha sonora, ate mesmo hoje o grafico é legal, recomendo muito esse jogo.

Игра суперская! Сюжет очень интересный но иногда непонятный и странный. Геймплей на высоте , затягивает играть часами , графика охринительная для 2004 года. Интересные герои, разнообразные задания, хорошо подобранные и сложные достижения которые интересно выполнять. Возможность ездить на разном транспорте. Финал тоже порадовал). Прошёл игру на трудном уровне сложности, иногда не мог пройти то или иное задание по часу сидел и пытался пройти. Игра заслуживает 10/10, советую всем купить и пройти :)

Yes.  Just yes.  Half life 2,  Has exceeded everones expectations and has also exceeded the expectations of physics,graphics,and gameplay <--- Important if you couldnt guess.  This game when it popped up.  Everyones mind was fucking BLOWN.  People were just amazed about how far ahead valve went in time to make this game, and fuck,  the only cutscene they had at the beginning fucking filled every bit of missing info the player (that they needed at the time) had just STARTING the game.  Honestly,  You could not have done a better job showing the sexual tension between Alyx and Gordan grow,  that simple brush hair back in the elevator just showed... ALL of it.  On how they managed to make this entire game in body (should have) made the player feel like he was actually there.  Not a  dude hes controlling.  Not once have I seen/heard anyone say.  "Yah the game is about this smart dude you control and help him and co. pass the trial and error," no. Never seen that.  The WHOLE entire game is about YOU not Gordan freeman. YOU the player.  Are the Person of Interest.  You are the guy with the M.I.T. education.  You ARE, The one Free Man.
